meanings.definition: A road or highway designed for high-speed traffic, typically with multiple lanes and no intersections.
meanings.sent1: The freeways were packed with cars rushing to get to work on time.
meanings.sent2: I prefer taking the freeways to avoid traffic lights and slow-moving vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The freeways were so busy that even the birds had to wait for a gap to fly across.
meanings.sent4: In the race of life, we all navigate our own freeways towards success.
meanings.sent5: The freeways hummed with the sound of engines as commuters made their way home.

meanings.definition: A system of roads and highways that allow for efficient travel between cities and regions.
meanings.sent1: The freeways connect different parts of the country, making travel quick and easy.
meanings.sent2: We planned our road trip using the freeways to reach each destination without delays.
meanings.sent3: The freeways seemed like giant ribbons weaving through the landscape, connecting everything together.
meanings.sent4: In the web of transportation, the freeways are the main threads that keep everything linked.
meanings.sent5: The freeways stretch out like veins on a map, carrying travelers to their destinations.
